abstract: Credit Suisse reports fourth-quarter loss of 5.83 billion Swiss francs, or about $5.75 billion, due to restructuring and choppy markets; year-ago profit was 691 million francs.

headline.print_headline: Credit Suisse Swings to a Loss After a Large Write-Down
headline.main: Credit Suisse Takes Big Loss on Write-Down in 4th Quarter

snippet: As part of a restructuring, the Swiss bank said it had taken a good-will charge of 3.8 billion francs as it reassessed the value of its investment unit.
lead_paragraph: As part of a restructuring, the Swiss bank said it had taken a good-will charge of 3.8 billion francs as it reassessed the value of its investment unit.
